function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Small sample size in some countries","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 through respiratory workers","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of copper-coated surfaces for mitigating sars-cov-2 propagation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential
